Explanation: Adds a comment in the script (ignored during execution)
Introduces a delay (in milliseconds) before the next command
Simulates holding Shift key or Shift+[key] combination
Simulates holding Alt key or Alt+[key] combination
Simulates holding Ctrl key or Ctrl+[key] combination
Simulates pressing the Down Arrow key
Simulates pressing the Up Arrow key
Simulates pressing the Left Arrow key
Simulates pressing the Right Arrow key
Simulates pressing the Menu key (Context menu key)
Simulates pressing the Page Up key
Simulates pressing the Page Down key
Repeats the last command specified number of times

Command: STRING_DELAY  Sets a default delay between characters in a string in milliseconds
